verses.verse: <S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>? Shall we <S%G1961>continue<s%> in <S%G266>sin<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> may <S%G4121>abound<s%>?
